mod.name: Reimu（博丽灵梦）
authors: 其他在群里帮助我们的大家
mod.description: 添加了 博麗靈夢 作为可选角色。希望大家喜欢。

cards.name: Advent Ceremony
cards.description:
Chose 1 kind of Kami to Advent.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Advent Ceremony+
cards.description:
Chose 1 kind of Kami to Advent.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fantasy Drunken Fist
cards.description:
Play 3 random Attacks of any color.
Add a *Dazed into your discard pile.

cards.name: Fantasy Drunken Fist+
cards.description:
Play 3 random upgraded Attacks of any color.
Add a *Dazed into your discard pile.

cards.name: Kagura Ceremony
cards.description:
Gain 10 Vigor.
Add a *Advent *Ceremony into discard pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Kagura Ceremony+
cards.description:
Gain 15 Vigor.
Add a *Advent *Ceremony into draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Poverty
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Ethereal.
At the end of your turn, lose 20 *Gold.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Duplex Barrier
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block twice.
Gain 3 Destruction Faith.
After being played, Transform into *Danmaku *Barrier.

cards.name: Duplex Barrier+
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block twice.
Gain 4 Destruction Faith.
After being played, Transform into *Danmaku *Barrier+.

cards.name: Floating
cards.description:
Flight: Draw 2 card.
Otherwise: Gain 1 Flight.

cards.name: Floating+
cards.description:
Flight: Draw 3 card.
Otherwise: Gain 1 Flight.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Air Strike
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Gain 1 Wind Faith.
Flight: Activate twice.

cards.name: Air Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Gain 1 Wind Faith.
Flight: Activate twice.

cards.name: Binding Border
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Apply 4 Constricted.

cards.name: Binding Border+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Apply 6 Constricted.

cards.name: Cautionary Border
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Gain 5 Vigor.
Gain 2 Destruction Faith.

cards.name: Cautionary Border+
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Gain 8 Vigor.
Gain 3 Destruction Faith.

cards.name: Colorful Path
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever you draw this card, increase your highest Faith by 1 and gain 3 Vigor.

cards.name: Colorful Path+
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever you draw this card, increase your highest Faith by 2 and gain 4 Vigor.

cards.name: Dimensional Point Rift
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Flight: enemy loses 8 Strength this turn.
Otherwise: Gain 1 Flight.

cards.name: Dimensional Point Rift+
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Flight: enemy loses 11 Strength this turn.
Otherwise: Gain 1 Flight.

cards.name: Emergency Take-off
cards.description:
Gain 1 Flight.
Gain 1 Vulnerable.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Emergency Take-off+
cards.description:
Gain 2 Flight.
Gain 2 Vulnerable.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Evil-Sealing Circle
cards.description:
Apply 2 Weak.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Evil-Sealing Circle+
cards.description:
Apply 3 Weak.
Apply 3 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Expanding Barrier
cards.description:
Gain 2 Mountain Faith.
Gain 5 Block.
All *Expanding *Barrier grant 2 additional Block this combat.

cards.name: Expanding Barrier+
cards.description:
Gain 2 Mountain Faith.
Gain 8 Block.
All *Expanding *Barrier grant 2 additional Block this combat.

cards.name: Expulsion
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage to ALL enemies.
Gain 3 Flame Faith.

cards.name: Expulsion+
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage to ALL enemies.
Gain 4 Flame Faith.

cards.name: Homing Amulet
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block.
When you lose ALL Flight, return this card to your hand.

cards.name: Homing Amulet+
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
When you lose ALL Flight, return this card to your hand.

cards.name: Instant Dimensional Rift
cards.description:
Until the next turn, deal 12 damage back to the enemy who first attacked you.
Gain 2 Thunderbolt Faith.

cards.name: Instant Dimensional Rift+
cards.description:
Until the next turn, deal 16 damage back to the enemy who first attacked you.
Gain 2 Thunderbolt Faith.

cards.name: Intuition
cards.description:
Scry 4.
Gain 1 Moon Faith.

cards.name: Intuition+
cards.description:
Scry 5.
Gain 2 Moon Faith.

cards.name: Light Orb into Shade
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage to a random enemy 2 times.
Gain 2 Destruction Faith.

cards.name: Light Orb into Shade+
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage to a random enemy 3 times.
Gain 2 Destruction Faith.

cards.name: Meditation
cards.description:
Can only be played if every card in your hand is a Skill.
Gain [E] and 2 Moon Faith.

cards.name: Meditation+
cards.description:
Can only be played if every card in your hand is a Skill.
Gain [E] [E] and 3 Moon Faith.

cards.name: Nine-Syllable
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Draw 1 card for every 10 Faith.

cards.name: Nine-Syllable+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Draw 1 card for every 10 Faith.

cards.name: Prosperity Prayer
cards.description:
Gain 2 Destruction Faith.
Add a Career O-mikuji into your hand.

cards.name: Prosperity Prayer+
cards.description:
Gain 3 Destruction Faith.
Add a Career O-mikuji into your hand.
(It won't be Worst Luck)

cards.name: Rain Dance Ceremony
cards.description:
Draw 1 card(s).
Gain [E] next turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Rain Dance Ceremony+
cards.description:
Draw 2 card(s).
Gain [E] next turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Safety Prayer
cards.description:
Gain 2 Mountain Faith.
Add a Safe O-mikuji into your hand.

cards.name: Safety Prayer+
cards.description:
Gain 3 Mountain Faith.
Add a Safe O-mikuji into your hand.
(It won't be Worst Luck)

cards.name: Air Maneuver
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block.
Flight: Gain 3 Wind Faith.
Otherwise: Gain 1 Flight.

cards.name: Air Maneuver+
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Flight: Gain 4 Wind Faith.
Otherwise: Gain 1 Flight.

cards.name: Ascension Kick
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Flight: Gain [E] and
draw 1 card.

cards.name: Ascension Kick+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Flight: Gain [E] and
draw 1 card.

cards.name: Bind
cards.description: Whenever an O-mikuji is created during combat, Upgrade it.

cards.name: Bind+
cards.description:
Innate.
Whenever an O-mikuji is created during combat, Upgrade it.

cards.name: Campaign
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage. Gain 3 Thunderbolt Faith.
If the enemy intends to attack, deal double damage.

cards.name: Campaign+
cards.description:
Deal 17 damage. Gain 4 Thunderbolt Faith.
If the enemy intends to attack, deal double damage.

cards.name: Danmaku Millionaire
cards.description:
Lose [E] [E] [E] [E].
Lose 10 Gold for each insufficient [E].
Deal 30 damage.

cards.name: Danmaku Millionaire+
cards.description:
Lose [E] [E] [E].
Lose 10 Gold for each insufficient [E].
Deal 30 damage.

cards.name: Darkness of the Crow
cards.description:
Apply 5 Constricted to all enemies.
Flight: Apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable to all enemies.

cards.name: Darkness of the Crow+
cards.description:
Apply 7 Constricted to all enemies.
Flight: Apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable to all enemies.

cards.name: Dichromatic Lotus Butterfly
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block twice.
Deal 5 damage twice.

cards.name: Dichromatic Lotus Butterfly+
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block twice.
Deal 7 damage twice.

cards.name: Exorcising Border
cards.description:
Exhaust a card.
Gain Flame Faith equal to it's cost.
Deal damage equal to Flame Faith to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Exorcising Border+
cards.description:
Exhaust a card.
Gain Flame Faith equal to double it's cost. Deal damage equal to Flame Faith to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Fantasy Rift
cards.description:
Ethereal.
This turn, whenever a card Exhausts, add a copy of it into your discard pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fantasy Rift+
cards.description:
This turn, whenever a card Exhausts, add a copy of it into your discard pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fantasy Seal
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage to a random enemy 4 times.
Transform if this card is in your hand when a Kami Advents.
Turn back when be played.

cards.name: Fantasy Seal
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage to a random enemy 5 times.
Transform if this card is in your hand when a Kami Advents.
Turn back when be played.

cards.name: Fine Line Fantasy
cards.description: Whenever a card is exhausted, gain 1 Flame Faith.

cards.name: Fine Line Fantasy+
cards.description: Whenever a card is exhausted, gain 1 Flame Faith.

cards.name: Flying
cards.description:
Gain X Flight and Wind Faith.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Flying+
cards.description: Gain X Flight and Wind Faith.

cards.name: Forced Landing
cards.description:
Flight: Lose 1 Flight and deal 17 damage to ALL enemies.
Gain 2 Thunderbolt Faith.

cards.name: Forced Landing+
cards.description:
Flight: Lose 1 Flight and deal 21 damage to ALL enemies.
Gain 3 Thunderbolt Faith.

cards.name: Foregathering Flowers
cards.description: Increase Vigor by 2 times.

cards.name: Foregathering Flowers+
cards.description: Increase Vigor by 3 times.

cards.name: High-Speed Prayer
cards.description:
Gain 2 Moon Faith.
Add a Learning O-mikuji into your hand.

cards.name: High-Speed Prayer+
cards.description:
Gain 3 Moon Faith.
Add a Learning O-mikuji into your hand.
(It won't be Worst Luck)

cards.name: Illusionary Moon
cards.description:
Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
Gain 2 random Faith.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Illusionary Moon+
cards.description:
Choose 1 of 3 random Upgraded cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
Gain 3 random Faith.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Kishin's Flame
cards.description:
Non-attack damage taken by ALL enemies are doubled.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Kishin's Flame+
cards.description:
Non-attack damage taken by ALL enemies are doubled.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Lay to Rest
cards.description: Gain Block equal to the number of unique buffs on you and unique debuffs on the target.

cards.name: Lay to Rest+
cards.description: Gain Block equal to the number of unique buffs on you and unique debuffs on the target.

cards.name: Love Prayer
cards.description:
Gain 2 Sun Faith.
Add a Romance O-mikuji into your hand.

cards.name: Love Prayer+
cards.description:
Gain 3 Sun Faith.
Add a Romance O-mikuji into your hand.
(It won't be Worst Luck)

cards.name: Miko Of Lucky
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, add 1 random O-mikuji into your hand.
(It won't be Worst Luck)

cards.name: Miko Of Lucky+
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, add 1 random O-mikuji into your hand.
(It won't be Worst Luck)

cards.name: Mountain Wind
cards.description:
Gain 1 Flight.
Put a Attack from your discard pile into your hand,
It costs 0 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mountain Wind+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Flight.
Put a Attack from your discard pile into your hand,
It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Oni-Binding Circle
cards.description: At the end of your turn, apply 2 Constricted to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Oni-Binding Circle+
cards.description: At the end of your turn, apply 3 Constricted to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Permanent Border
cards.description:
Innate.
Gain 2 Thunderbolt Faith whenever you lose Flight.
Gain 2 Wind Faith whenever you lose HP.

cards.name: Permanent Border+
cards.description:
Innate.
Gain 2 Thunderbolt Faith whenever you lose Flight.
Gain 2 Wind Faith whenever you lose HP.

cards.name: Preparation Ceremony
cards.description:
Put 1 card from your draw or discard pile into the top of your draw pile.
Gain 3 Destruction Faith.
Gain 3 Mountain Faith.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Preparation Ceremony+
cards.description:
Put 1 card from your draw or discard pile into the top of your draw pile.
Gain 5 Destruction Faith.
Gain 5 Mountain Faith.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Quick-Witted Consecration
cards.description:
At the end of your turn,
Gain 1 Block for each kind of Faith.

cards.name: Quick-Witted Consecration+
cards.description:
At the end of your turn,
Gain 1 Block for each kind of Faith.

cards.name: Recycle Ceremony
cards.description:
Return a card from your exhaust pile to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Recycle Ceremony+
cards.description:
Return a card from your exhaust pile to your hand and Upgrade it.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Revelation
cards.description:
Scry 1.
Draw 1 card.
Gain 1 Sun Faith.

cards.name: Revelation+
cards.description:
Scry 2.
Draw 1 card.
Gain 2 Sun Faith.

cards.name: Rule Violation Barrier
cards.description: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, apply 1 stacks of an additional random debuff.

cards.name: Rule Violation Barrier+
cards.description: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, apply 2 stacks of an additional random debuff.

cards.name: Sacrifice Kami
cards.description:
Remove a random non-Kagutsuchi Kami that is in Advent.
Gain 12 Flame Faith.

cards.name: Sacrifice Kami+
cards.description:
Remove a random non-Kagutsuchi Kami that is in Advent.
Gain 16 Flame Faith.

cards.name: Sealing Needle
cards.description:
Deal 1 damage. If it deals unblocked damage, the enemy loses 2 Strength.
Repeat 2 times. Exhaust.

cards.name: Sealing Needle+
cards.description:
Deal 1 damage. If it deals unblocked damage, the enemy loses 3 Strength.
Repeat 3 times. Exhaust.

cards.name: Spiritual Outbreak
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage to all enemies.
This attack does not spend Vigor.

cards.name: Spiritual Outbreak+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage to all enemies.
This attack does not spend Vigor.

cards.name: Universal Spirituality
cards.description: Gain 1 Vigor whenever you play a card.

cards.name: Universal Spirituality+
cards.description: Gain 2 Vigor whenever you play a card.

cards.name: Yin-Yang Orb
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Damage dealt is increased by 8 for every unique debuff on the target.

cards.name: Yin-Yang Orb+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Damage dealt is increased by 11 for every unique debuff on the target.

cards.name: Yin-Yang Scattering
cards.description: Whenever you gain Faith, gain 1 of a random Faith that is not in Advent.

cards.name: Yin-Yang Scattering+
cards.description:
Innate.
Whenever you gain Faith, gain 1 of a random Faith that is not in Advent.

cards.name: Yin-Yang Sign
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to the amount of Constricted on the target.
Gain [E] for each kind of DeBuff your target has.

cards.name: Yin-Yang Sign+
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to the amount of Constricted on the target.
Gain [E] for each kind of DeBuff your target has.

cards.name: Authority
cards.description:
Gain 5 Sun Faith.
If Amaterasu is in Advent,
gain 1 Buffer.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Authority+
cards.description:
Gain 5 Sun Faith.
If Amaterasu is in Advent,
gain 1 Buffer.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Boundary of Divine
cards.description:
Let Amaterasu and Tsukuyomi Advent.
1 turn late, *remove your Sun Faith and Moon Faith.

cards.name: Boundary of Divine+
cards.description:
Let Amaterasu and Tsukuyomi Advent.
1 turn late, *halve your Sun Faith and Moon Faith.

cards.name: Card Of Sanctity
cards.description:
Add X random Upgraded O-mikuji into your hand.
Gain X random Faith.
(It won't be Worst Luck)

cards.name: Card Of Sanctity+
cards.description:
Add X random Upgraded O-mikuji into your hand.
Gain X random Faith.
(It won't be Worst Luck)

cards.name: Ceremonies Resonance
cards.description:
Play all *Ceremony cards from your exhaust pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ceremonies Resonance+
cards.description:
Play all *Ceremony cards from your exhaust pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Clean Ceremony
cards.description:
Gain 1 Artifact.
Add a *Kagura *Ceremony into discard pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Clean Ceremony+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Artifact.
Add a *Kagura *Ceremony+ draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Determination
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to your lost HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Determination+
cards.description: Deal damage equal to your lost HP.

cards.name: Dragon-Slaying Circle
cards.description:
Deal 26 damage to ALL enemies.
Remove all of your Faith.

cards.name: Dragon-Slaying Circle+
cards.description:
Deal 34 damage to ALL enemies.
Remove all of your Faith.

cards.name: Dream Battle
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Play a random card when this card is drawn.

cards.name: Dream Battle+
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Play a random Upgraded card when this card is drawn.

cards.name: Fantasy Heaven
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.
For each Kami in Advent, repeat this effect.

cards.name: Fantasy Heaven+
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage to ALL enemies.
For each Kami in Advent, repeat this effect.

cards.name: Fantasy Rift
cards.description:
This turn, your next card is played twice.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fantasy Rift+
cards.description: This turn, your next card is played twice.

cards.name: Hakurei Illusion
cards.description:
At the end of target's turn, deals the damage equal to the amount of damage you dealt to it this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hakurei Illusion+
cards.description: At the end of target's turn, deal the damage equal to the amount of damage you dealt to it this turn.

cards.name: Kami Ceremony
cards.description:
Let 1 random Kami Advent.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Kami Ceremony+
cards.description:
Let 1 random Kami Advent.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mysterious Disappearance
cards.description:
Retain.
You don't take damage next round.
Skip your next turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mysterious Disappearance+
cards.description:
Retain.
You don't take damage next round.
Skip your next turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Prayer Ceremony
cards.description:
Choose and add 1 Great Luck O-mikuji to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Prayer Ceremony+
cards.description:
Choose and add 1 Great Luck O-mikuji to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sky-Conquering Kick
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage 0 time.
Increase the number of hits every time you gain Flight this combat.

cards.name: Sky-Conquering Kick+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage 0 time.
Increase the number of hits every time you gain Flight this combat.

cards.name: Spirit Medium Form
cards.description: At the end of your turn, gain 4 random Faith.

cards.name: Spirit Medium Form+
cards.description: At the end of your turn, gain 6 random Faith.

cards.name: Wild Exorcism Dance
cards.description: From within the top 3 cards of your draw pile, play all Attack cards and discard all non-Attack cards.

cards.name: Wild Exorcism Dance+
cards.description: From within the top 5 cards of your draw pile, play all Attack cards and discard all non-Attack cards.

cards.name: Yin-Yang Asuka'i
cards.description:
Gain 2 Flight.
Deal damage equal to 4 times your Flight.

cards.name: Yin-Yang Asuka'i+
cards.description:
Gain 2 Flight.
Deal damage equal to 6 times your Flight.

relics.name: Yin-Yang Orb
relics.description: Gain 1 Flight at the start of each combat.
relics.flavorText: An orb containing spiritual energy found in the basement of a shrine.

relics.name: Bow
relics.description: Whenever you lose Flight, deal 4 damage to all enemies.
relics.flavorText: The Hakureis isn't exactly known for their sharp fashion sense.

relics.name: Insatiable Onusa
relics.description: Deal 6 damage to all enemies at the start of each combat. Each time you defeat an elite or boss, increase the damage dealt by 1 point.
relics.flavorText: A wooden wand used in exorcism rituals. This one in particular seems to slowly, yet constantly, grow in size.

relics.name: Komainu
relics.description: Exhaust the first 2 Status cards you draw in battle. When you do so, draw an additional card.
relics.flavorText: A lion-like creature that serves as a guardian. This one is drawn on a card, so...

relics.name: Sky Orb
relics.description: The first time you lose all Flight each combat, gain 1 Flight.
relics.flavorText: An orb infused with the essence of the boundless skies.

relics.name: Faded Rune
relics.description: At the start of each combat, reduce the damage done by random enemies by 50% until it are attacked.
relics.flavorText: A magic rune worn by age. Time did not seem to dull its effects, however.

relics.name: Shintai
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a Shintai. At the start of each combat, add that Shintai to your hand.
relics.flavorText: Worshipped as the physical repository of a god. Cats love it, for some reason.

relics.name: Tea
relics.description: If you have less than 50 Gold, heal 30% HP whenever you enter a Rest Site.
relics.flavorText: The water always comes AFTER the leaf.

relics.name: Torch of Delirium
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add 1 Madness+ into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Staring at it, you feel like your soul is being sucked in.

relics.name: Exorcist's Salt
relics.description: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, they lose 4 HP.
relics.flavorText: Blessed salt used to ward off evil spirits

relics.name: Genbu's Shell
relics.description: Increases damage reduction given by Flight from 50% to 75%.
relics.flavorText: The shell of a mythical turtle spirit. Maybe the spirit inside can help you climb by allowing you to ride on its back?

relics.name: Kagura Bell
relics.description: Whenever a Kami Advents, gain [E] and draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: It is said that each ring from this bell herald the coming of the gods.

relics.name: Pure White
relics.description: Until you take HP damage each combat, at the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.
relics.flavorText: This dress is very easy to soil.

relics.name: Ema
relics.description:
At the start of each combat, choose and remove 1 card from your deck.
After 2 turns, put it in your hand and reduce its cost to 0.
relics.flavorText: A sign created as means to deliver a wish to a god.

relics.name: O-miki
relics.description: Add 1 Dazed into your discard pile and gain [E] at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: Wine meant to be an offering to the gods. Even just a small sip is enough to strongly intoxicate a person.

relics.name: Tiny Shrine
relics.description:
Right Click : Lose 1 Gold and add 1 random O-mikuji into your hand.
This effect can be used 3 times per combat.
relics.flavorText: People believe that money can bring good luck. They're not exactly wrong..

relics.name: Crown of the Heavens
relics.description: Whenever a Kami Advents, deal 20 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Wearing it, you feel the power of the gods surging through you.

relics.name: Donation Box
relics.description: Increases the Advent threshold for all Faiths by 3. Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: There are many improbable events, such as someone actually reading the Bunbunmaru, and yet they're all still more plausible than someone putting money in this box.

relics.name: Red Thread of Fate
relics.description: At the start of the first 3 turns of each combat, put 1 card from your draw pile into your hand.
relics.flavorText: It is said that the gods use it to determine the fate of mortals.

relics.name: Shining Orb
relics.description: Replaces Yin-Yang Orb. Gain 3 Flight at the start of each combat.
relics.flavorText: The Yin-Yang orb, after careful polishing. Gazing at the light it reflects soothes one's soul.

relics.name: Cheater's Sign
relics.description: Whenever an O-mikuji is created during combat, it will always be at least Good Luck.
relics.flavorText: A fortune picker that only has the best of predictions written on it. Mystical problems require mundane solutions.

relics.name: Tentacle Pot
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 4 Constricted to all enemies.
relics.flavorText: Inside this pot are eldritch, perpetually hungry beings. Do not open.

potions.name: Bottled Condemnations
potions.description: Add 1 to all stackable debuffs (e.g. Weak, Vulnerable) on the target.

potions.name: Pink Potion
potions.description: From 3 random Pink (Reimu) cards choose 1 to add to your hand, it costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Hakurei Potion
potions.description: Add 1 to all stackable buffs (e.g. Strength, Dexterity) on you.

potions.name: Magic Potion
potions.description:
Set your [E] to the amount it was at the start of this turn.
Gain 1 energy at the start of your next 3 turns.

keywords.name: Advent
keywords.description: Whenever a Faith reaches a certain amount (default 10), it Advents into a Kami. When this happens, remove all debuffs on you.

keywords.name: Amaterasu
keywords.description: Goddess of the sun. If in Advent, gain [E] at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Career
keywords.description:
GreatLuck :Deals 21 damage.
GoodLuck :Deals 14 damage.
PoorLuck :Deals 7 damage.
WorstLuck :Deals 0 damage.

keywords.name: Constricted
keywords.description: At the end of their turn, take damage equal to the amount of Constricted stacks.

keywords.name: Destruction
keywords.description: Faith towards the storm god, Susano-o.

keywords.name: Faith
keywords.description: Represents devotion towards a Kami. Gain enough amount to trigger Advent of Kami in combat.

keywords.name: Flame
keywords.description: Faith towards the fire god, Kagutsuchi. Unlike other Faith counters, does not have an upper limit.

keywords.name: Flight
keywords.description: Reduces damage taken from attacks. One stack is removed for each hit received when Flight is present.

keywords.name: Fortune
keywords.description:
GreatLuck :Gain 30 gold.
GoodLuck :Gain 20 gold.
PoorLuck :Gain 10 gold.
WorstLuck :Gain 0 gold.

keywords.name: Kagutsuchi
keywords.description: God of fire. If in Advent, deal damage equal to your Flame Faith to ALL enemies at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Kami
keywords.description: Unique buff that lasts for the entire combat, but only activates when they Advent.

keywords.name: Learning
keywords.description:
GreatLuck :Draw 4 cards.
GoodLuck :Draw 3 cards.
PoorLuck :Draw 2 cards.
WorstLuck :Draw 0 cards.

keywords.name: Moon
keywords.description: Faith towards the moon god, Tsukuyomi.

keywords.name: Mountain
keywords.description: Faith towards the mountain god, Ohoyama-tsumi.

keywords.name: O-mikuji
keywords.description: 0-cost card that Exhaust when played and vary in effect depending on its type and Luck level.

keywords.name: Ohoyama-tsumi
keywords.description: God of mountains. If in Advent, gain increased Block from playing cards.

keywords.name: Romance
keywords.description:
GreatLuck :Gain 3 energy.
GoodLuck :Gain 2 energy.
PoorLuck :Gain 1 energy.
WorstLuck :Gain 0 energy.

keywords.name: Safe
keywords.description:
GreatLuck :Gain 15 Block.
GoodLuck :Gain 10 Block.
PoorLuck :Gain 5 Block.
WorstLuck :Gain 0 Block.

keywords.name: Sun
keywords.description: Faith towards the sun goddess, Amaterasu.

keywords.name: Susano-o
keywords.description: God of storms. If in Advent, your attack deal increased damage.

keywords.name: Takemikazuchi
keywords.description: God of thunder. If in Advent, inflict Divine Punishment on any enemy that hits you. Divine Punishment deals damage at the end of the turn.

keywords.name: Takeminakata
keywords.description: God of the winds. If in Advent, gain Flight at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Thunderbolt
keywords.description: Faith towards the thunder god, Takemikazuchi.

keywords.name: Tsukuyomi
keywords.description: God of the moon. If in Advent, Upgrade the top card in your draw pile and draw additional cards at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Wind
keywords.description: Faith towards the wind god, Takeminakata.
